name: happily(never)after
description:
happily(never)after is my entry for the Weekly Game Jam 76! The theme is Afterlife and you control a boy on his journey on a 1 bit afterlife world where you are tested on your platforming skills, you also have your own guide to help you!

OBSERVATION: The game can take a significant amount of time to load on Web GL (around 30 seconds or so) but it is working fine! The downloadable version works without any delay. 

The project source code can be found here: https://github.com/guilhermepo2/wgj76
